name: Geolocation
description: Access the user's location information such as latitude and longitude.

conditions.name: Is watching location
conditions.description: True if the user's location is currently being tracked.

conditions.name: On location update
conditions.description: Triggered when requesting or watching the user's position when the location is updated.

conditions.name: On error
conditions.description: Triggered when a geolocation error occurs.

conditions.name: Is supported
conditions.description: True if the current platform supports geolocation.

actions.name: Request location
actions.description: Make a one-off request to get the user's current location.
actions.display_text: Request location ({0} accuracy, timeout {1}, maximum age {2})

params.name: Accuracy
params.description: The position accuracy to request. 'High' may take longer to get results and consume more battery.

params.name: Timeout
params.description: The maximum length of time in seconds that the device can take to return a position.

params.name: Maximum age
params.description: The maximum age in seconds of a cached result that can be returned. Use 0 to disable caching.

actions.name: Watch location
actions.description: Start receiving regular updates of the user's location.
actions.display_text: Watch location ({0} accuracy, timeout {1}, maximum age {2})

params.name: Accuracy
params.description: The position accuracy to request. 'High' may take longer to get results and consume more battery.

params.name: Timeout
params.description: The maximum length of time in seconds that the device can take to return a position.

params.name: Maximum age
params.description: The maximum age in seconds of a cached result that can be returned. Use 0 to disable caching.

actions.name: Stop watching
actions.description: Stop watching a previous 'Watch location' action.

expressions.name: ErrorMessage
expressions.description: In 'On error', the relevant error message.

expressions.name: Timestamp
expressions.description: The timestamp at which the current details were retrieved.

expressions.name: Latitude
expressions.description: The latitude position in decimal degrees.

expressions.name: Longitude
expressions.description: The longitude position in decimal degrees.

expressions.name: Altitude
expressions.description: The altitude above sea-level in meters, if available.

expressions.name: Accuracy
expressions.description: The estimated accuracy in meters of the latitude and longitude.

expressions.name: AltitudeAccuracy
expressions.description: The estimated accuracy in meters of the altitude, if available.

expressions.name: Heading
expressions.description: The direction of travel in degrees relative to due north, if available.

expressions.name: Speed
expressions.description: The speed of travel in meters per second, if available.
